properties.name: value
properties.description: Depends on the type. Examples: for "text" use "Send", for "fontawesome" use "fa-battery-quarter", for "ionicon" use "\uf48a" (go to http://ionicons.com, right-click and inspect the icon and use the value you find in :before). Note that some fonticons are not supported as the embedded fonts in the plugin may lag behind a little. So try one of the older icons first.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: If type is "text" you can set this to either "normal", "bold" or "italic".

properties.name: onPress
properties.description: A function invoked when the button is pressed. Use this button to prompt the user what he wants to do next by for instance rendering an ActionSheet.
